meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a goad.
meanings.sent1: The sharp thorns on the plant had a goadlike appearance.
meanings.sent2: The farmer used a goadlike stick to guide the cattle.
meanings.sent3: The goadlike spikes on the fence kept the rabbits away.
meanings.sent4: Her goadlike determination pushed her to finish the race.
meanings.sent5: The goadlike wind urged the leaves to dance in the air.

meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel would goadlike the dog by chattering from the tree.
meanings.sent4: The urgent message would goadlike her into making a quick decision.
meanings.sent5: The persistent alarm clock goadlike him out of bed every morning.
